summary: The document details the investigation of an armed robbery and homicide at Green Pearl Vintage Gifts on October 25, 2002. Kathy Poindexter was found dead from gunshot wounds, and various pieces of evidence were collected, including DNA and fingerprints. The report includes initial observations, witness statements, and a list of items collected for forensic analysis.
conclusion: The investigation confirmed the death of Kathy Poindexter as a homicide due to gunshot wounds. Evidence collected includes DNA and fingerprints, with some items linked to individuals present at the scene.
location: Green Pearl Vintage Gifts, 23 Rose Street

people.name: Brad Baker
people.relevance: Complainant and friend/ex-boyfriend of the victim

people.name: Janet Jones
people.relevance: Owner of Green Pearl Vintage Gifts

people.name: Samantha Webster
people.relevance: Employee of Green Pearl Vintage Gifts

events.details: Armed robbery and homicide at Green Pearl Vintage Gifts.
Kathy Poindexter was found dead from gunshot wounds.
Detective Colin Williams arrived at the crime scene.
